duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the account management, client/lender compliance, and ongoing relationships for building, monitoring, and retaining a performing customer base.
Perform due-diligence, underwriting, legal documentation, and analysis of financial data for new and existing complex asset-based loans
Responsible for the credit quality and performance of the loan portfolio, loan documentation, and borrowing-base calculation
Prepare loan packages for approval and present underwriting memo for approval
Analyze and report the financial performance of borrowers and ensure compliance with financial and loan covenants
Build and maintain relationships with a high degree of customer satisfaction
Compile and analyze periodic financial statements and tax returns of borrowers
Monitor and handle borrower deposit and loan disbursement/payment activity
Provide exceptional internal and external customer service
Assist with oversight and management of troubled loans and workout situations
Establishing scope of work, ordering, reviewing, and analysis of field exams

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business or Finance (or equivalent industry expertise)
